title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Integrated plan for urban region, including two weeks field survey. Theories and principles of urban development plan and preparation for survey and data collection. Field survey of the study area. Analyses of data and information; Planning for urban area and its region (structure plan / development plan) with emphasis on: a) Land use and transportation network, b) Infrastructure plan, c) Action area programs and urban renewal plan, d) Capital budget and financing, e) Administrative and management backup for plan implementation.
